task.title: Creating a ditamap
task.shortdesc: Create a ditamap using Oxygen XML Author.

context.p: DITA maps are documents that organize topics and other resources into structured collections of information. DITA maps specify hierarchy and the relationships among the topics; they also provide the context in which keys are defined and resolved. DITA maps should have . ditamap file extensions. Use this procedure to create a ditamap using Oxygen XML Author.

step.cmd: Open an instance of Oxygen XML Author.
Frm the top left hand corner, click File New
step.stepresult: The Choose a file template dialog box displays.

substep.cmd: In the field provided, type map.
In the Title field, enter a name for your map.
Observe the path on your computer where the file is being created. Ensure that the path is correct.
